sentences.en: Added Hero ID data to the replay.
He has watched a video replay of his fall on numerous occasions.
sentences.cn: 他多次看自己跌倒时的重放录像.

sentences.en: I think the session key - authenticator business takes care of the replay problem.
sentences.cn: 我认为会话密钥验证器的机制解决了盗用的问题.

sentences.en: I watched a slow-motion videotape replay of his fall.
sentences.cn: 我看了一遍录像带上他摔倒时的慢动作重放。

sentences.en: I watched Ktla and reviewed several times and watched the replay.
sentences.cn: 我看了Ktla5套,然后重新看了很多次,又看了重放.

sentences.en: If there has to be a replay we are confident of victory.
sentences.cn: 如果重新比赛，我们有信心取得胜利。

sentences.en: It was clear from the instant replay that the player was fouled.
sentences.cn: 从立即重播画面中清楚可见那球员犯规.

sentences.en: Replay events in the order they were traced. This option enables debugging.
sentences.cn: 为跟踪事件而重播这些事件.此选项启用调试.

sentences.en: Replay events using multiple threads. This option optimizes performance and disables debugging.
sentences.cn: 使用多线程重播事件. 此选项优化性能并禁用调试.

sentences.en: Run that excerpt back to the beginning and replay it in slow motion.
sentences.cn: 把录像片倒到头,然后慢放.

sentences.en: So what saved us from a full replay of the Great Depression?
sentences.cn: 那么,是什么让我们避免重蹈大萧条覆辙的 呢 ?

sentences.en: The match will be replayed on Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 比赛将在星期三再进行一次。

sentences.en: The two sides will clash there only if Chelsea beat Sunderland in their quarter-final replay.
sentences.cn: 只有切尔西队在四分之一决赛的重赛中击败桑德兰队，双方才会交锋。

sentences.en: This is almost a replay of a conversation I had today.
sentences.cn: 这就象把我今天的谈话又重放了一遍.

sentences.en: We watched a replay of the wedding on video.
sentences.cn: 我们观看了重放的婚礼录像。

words.tran_cn: [电视][广播]重放；重演；重新比赛

trans.tran_en: a game that is played again because neither team won the first time
to play a game again because neither team won the first time
